comments.body:
```suggestion
declare function pWaitFor(condition: () => PromiseLike<boolean> | boolean, options?: { interval?: number, timeout?: number }): Promise<void>;
```
From the source, it looks like the options should be an object: https://github.com/sindresorhus/p-wait-for/blob/master/index.js
I'm trying to restore typings for v1. What you read are v2 docs. I  linked the wrong docs in the description, [here](https://github.com/sindresorhus/p-wait-for/tree/v1.0.0) are the correct ones.

diffHunk:
@@ -1,1 +6,10 @@export = pWaitFor;

declare function pWaitFor(condition: () => PromiseLike<boolean> | boolean, interval?: number): Promise<void>;
